marklogic.body:
What a great response, thoughtful and classy. Just reading that makes me want to try your Spot, despite a 20 mile drive. One thing that kind of stands out for me, by NOT saying what the heck O.H.S.O. means, kind of comes Off pretentious. I'm sure that isn't your intent- i'm guessing it's about building excitement, etc. but when telling my friends about your Spot, and they ask what the name means, I look like an asshole having to say, "Oh, I don't know- they won't say what the name means." Kind of weird, right?
Keep up the good work, I look forward to patronizing your business.
